mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, U.NAME, U.BIRTH, U.EMAIL, U.PHONE, U.JOB, R.ROLE, U.ADDRESS, U.GENDER FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN USER_INFO U ON M.ID=U.ID INNER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ID=R.ID WHERE M.ID=#{id}
SELECT PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT M.ID, U.NAME, U.BIRTH, U.GENDER, U.PHONE, U.EMAIL, U.ADDRESS, R.ROLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN USER_INFO U ON M.ID=U.ID INNER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ID=R.ID WHERE M.ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PWD=#{pwd} WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE USER_INFO SET NAME=#{name}, JOB=#{job}, PHONE=CONCAT(#{phone1},'-',#{phone2},'-',#{phone3}), EMAIL=#{email}, ADDRESS=#{address}, HANDICAP=#{handicap} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT R.BNO, R.RENT_DATE, R.SUBMIT_DATE, R.CHECK_SUBMIT, R.CHECK_LATE, B.BTITLE, DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),R.SUBMIT_DATE)>0 AS late, R.DELAY FROM RENT_BOOK R INNER JOIN BOOK B ON R.BNO=B.BNO WHERE R.ID=#{id} AND CHECK_SUBMIT=FALSE
select reserve_date, reserve_end, a.bno, b.btitle from reserve_book a inner join book b on a.bno=b.bno where id=#{id}
SELECT R.BNO, R.RENT_DATE, R.SUBMIT_DATE, B.BTITLE FROM RENT_BOOK R INNER JOIN BOOK B ON R.BNO=B.BNO WHERE R.ID=#{id}
SELECT C.CSELECT, C.TITLE, C.MAX_CNT, C.TOCNT, L.CULTURE_DATE, L.STATE FROM CULTURE C INNER JOIN CULTURE_LIST L ON C.NUM=L.ANUM WHERE L.ID=#{id}
SELECT A.ASELECT, A.TITLE, A.MAX_CNT, A.TOCNT, L.AFTER_DATE, L.STATE FROM AFTER A INNER JOIN AFTER_LIST L ON A.NUM=L.ANUM WHERE L.ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE RENT_BOOK SET SUBMIT_DATE=ADDDATE(SUBMIT_DATE, INTERVAL 7 DAY), DELAY=1 WHERE BNO=#{bno} AND CHECK_SUBMIT=FALSE
